name: Nautilus Tank
description:
Left Click to Shoot    -   Right Click to Mortar

Your tank's engine is broken and the only way to capture the enemy FLAG is by shooting to move in REVERSE!
First to 3 wins!

Made for the Mini Jame Gam #14

Programming, Game Design, Sound Effects - by Craft Beetle

Art, Play Testing, Music Editing - by Sovigon

Sound effects made using ChipTone

Music by Waterflame
